title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.24 - Retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 1107.24 - Retention of records

State Regulations

All persons and organizations conducting approved programs or
courses of study shall retain the records of all students for a period of two
years after the completion thereof, and such papers shall be available for
inspection by duly authorized representatives of the department at all tines
during such period. Notes

1107.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
